installCommand: if [ -f server.js ]; then npm install && npm --prefix frontend install; elif [ -f ../server.js ]; then npm --prefix .. install && npm install; else npm install; fi
buildCommand: if [ -d frontend ]; then npm --prefix frontend run build; elif [ -f package.json ]; then npm run build; elif [ -f ../frontend/package.json ]; then npm --prefix ../frontend run build; else echo 'No frontend build script found'; fi
